headline: Fox Corp (FOX) Q3 2025 Earnings Call Highlights: Record Free Cash Flow and Super Bowl Success ...
summary: Fox Corp (FOX) reports a 27% revenue increase, fueled by a historic Super Bowl viewership and robust advertising growth, despite challenges in net income.
